data.lyric:
[ti:Don't Believe The Hype (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:THE GOAT (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Don't Believe The Hype (Explicit) - Polo G
[00:03.72]Lyrics by： Taurus Bartlett/Joseph Steele/Darrin Barthellemy/Angelo Callari
[00:07.44]Composed by：Taurus Bartlett/Joseph Steele/Darrin Barthellemy/Angelo Callari
[00:11.16]N***as sayin' they the G O A T but I can't buy into the hype
[00:14.39]I dig deep into my spirit when I spit into the mic
[00:16.66]All them sit-downs in that county made me think about my life
[00:19.46]
[00:20.11]Went through some tragedies I made it out to make it right
[00:23.06]D Major baby
[00:23.71]I was doin' d**gs just to get me through the night
[00:25.95]They weren't with me through my struggles all this s**t I sacrificed
[00:29.29]I climbed out the darkness now my Patek shinin' bright
[00:31.95]I been ballin' just for you I put y'all faces in my ice
[00:34.77]I got a problem it's no problem my lil' brother gon' get him
[00:37.75]Before he hopped up off that porch we always knew it was in him
[00:40.76]Don't give no f**k the twins gone and he wish he was with him
[00:43.76]He say them n***as ain't been slidin' and his crown don't fit him
[00:46.93]He want all them n***as dead it's sad to say but I feel him
[00:49.87]If I ain't had so much to lose I'd be riskin' it with him
[00:52.91]Always rap about the guys 'cause I genuinely miss 'em
[00:55.67]Five years later thousand tears later still feel like the day when they hit 'em
[00:59.56]Make sure I always say y'all name so ain't no way they forget 'em
[01:02.64]Gon' always feel like f**k the opps 'cause n***a I can't forgive 'em
[01:05.58]I got that s**t up out the mud I spent 10K on my denims
[01:08.62]Snakes in disguise they try to love you with a heart full of venom
[01:11.43]N***as sayin' they the G O A T but I can't buy into the hype
[01:13.91]I dig deep into my spirit when I spit into the mic
[01:16.96]All them sit-downs in that county made me think about my life
[01:20.10]Went through some tragedies I made it out to make it right
[01:23.23]I was doin' d**gs just to get me through the night
[01:25.94]They weren't with me through my struggles all this s**t I sacrificed
[01:29.29]I climbed out the darkness now my Patek shinin' bright
[01:31.93]I been ballin' just for you I put y'all faces in my ice
[01:34.92]With clips we pop out taper s**t like who need a trim
[01:37.70]Inherit hate it got me wonderin' can we forgive
[01:40.90]Everybody got they input on how we should live oh
[01:44.39]Life on the road I barely see the crib
[01:46.63]FaceTime the fam my son smilin' every time I call
[01:49.70]Back then I slipped up I got artwork on them county walls
[01:52.70]I signed a contract like Carmelo I'm just tryna ball
[01:55.71]Matter of time before we blitz him he been tryna stall
[01:58.65]Got smoke for hoppin' in this s**t he shouldn't have got involved
[02:01.66]Them R I P s put him to sleep like he off Tylenol
[02:04.65]Hot 'nem gon' tweak them boys crazy they ain't got it all
[02:07.71]You know my pain and you my brother I'm gon' ride for y'all
[02:10.72]N***as sayin' they the G O A T but I can't buy into the hype
[02:13.92]I dig deep into my spirit when I spit into the mic
[02:16.95]All them sit-downs in that county made me think about my life
[02:20.11]Went through some tragedies I made it out to make it right
[02:22.74]
[02:23.29]I was doin' d**gs just to get me through the night
[02:25.94]They weren't with me through my struggles all this s**t I sacrificed
[02:29.29]I climbed out the darkness now my Patek shinin' bright
[02:31.94]I been ballin' just for you I put y'all faces in my ice oh oh oh
data.trans:
[ti:Don't Believe The Hype (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:THE GOAT (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.72]//
[00:07.44]//
[00:11.16]很多人都说自己是最优秀的 但我不能听他们吹牛
[00:14.39]当我歌唱的时候 我会深入挖掘自己的灵魂
[00:16.66]坐在县监狱里的那些日子 让我好好思考了一下我的人生
[00:19.46]
[00:20.11]经历了一些悲剧 我终于走了出来 闯出了成绩
[00:23.06]D. Major制作
[00:23.71]我吃那些东西只是想要度过难熬的夜
[00:25.95]在我经历困苦时 他们不在我身边 我牺牲了太多
[00:29.29]我挣脱了黑暗 如今我的百达翡丽光芒万丈
[00:31.95]我炫耀财富就是为了给你看 我让你们都盯着我的钻石看
[00:34.77]我遇到点麻烦 这没啥 我的小弟会帮我解决他
[00:37.75]在他走上街头之前 我们就知道他有这种潜质
[00:40.76]什么都不在乎 双胞胎已经走了 他希望自己当初没有离开他
[00:43.76]他说那些家伙一直都不支持他 他的皇冠好像也不合适
[00:46.93]他想把那些家伙统统消灭掉 说来伤心 但我理解他
[00:49.87]要是我没有那么多珍贵的东西 我也会和他一起冒个险
[00:52.91]总是在歌里提起那些人 因为我真的很想念他们
[00:55.67]五年过去了 流了无数眼泪 还是感觉就像多年前
[00:59.56]我要确保经常提起你们的名字 这样他们就不会忘记你们
[01:02.64]永远仇恨那些敌人 因为 兄弟 我不能原谅他们
[01:05.58]我终于从泥潭中挣脱出来 现在我花了一万块买牛仔裤
[01:08.62]精心伪装的阴险小人 表面上爱你 实际上心怀鬼胎
[01:11.43]很多人都说自己是最优秀的 但我不能听他们吹牛
[01:13.91]当我歌唱的时候 我会深入挖掘自己的灵魂
[01:16.96]坐在县监狱里的那些日子 让我好好思考了一下我的人生
[01:20.10]经历了一些悲剧 我终于走了出来 闯出了成绩
[01:23.23]我吃那些东西只是想要度过难熬的夜
[01:25.94]在我经历困苦时 他们不在我身边 我牺牲了太多
[01:29.29]我挣脱了黑暗 如今我的百达翡丽光芒万丈
[01:31.93]我炫耀财富就是为了给你看 我让你们都盯着我的钻石看
[01:34.92]我们带着武器出现 解决一切麻烦 不需要修饰
[01:37.70]仇恨不断传播 这让我开始思考 我们能否原谅对方
[01:40.90]每个人都在努力研究我们应该怎样生活
[01:44.39]一直都在奔波 我很少回家
[01:46.63]和家人视频通话 每次都能看到儿子的微笑
[01:49.70]当初我倒霉 进了监狱 县监狱的墙上还有我的涂鸦
[01:52.70]我签了一张合约 就像Carmelo Anthony 我只想发财
[01:55.71]我们总有一天会把他干掉 他一直想跟踪我们
[01:58.65]掺和这些事情 结下了恩怨 他就不该牵扯进来
[02:01.66]到时候我们会让他长眠不起 就像吃了泰勒诺
[02:04.65]火热场景将会出现 那些小子太疯狂 他们并不了解我们的全部
[02:07.71]你了解我的痛苦 你是我的兄弟 我会为你们赴汤蹈火
[02:10.72]很多人都说自己是最优秀的 但我不能听他们吹牛
[02:13.92]当我歌唱的时候 我会深入挖掘自己的灵魂
[02:16.95]坐在县监狱里的那些日子 让我好好思考了一下我的人生
[02:20.11]经历了一些悲剧 我终于走了出来 闯出了成绩
[02:22.74]
[02:23.29]我吃那些东西只是想要度过难熬的夜
[02:25.94]在我经历困苦时 他们不在我身边 我牺牲了太多
[02:29.29]我挣脱了黑暗 如今我的百达翡丽光芒万丈
[02:31.94]我炫耀财富就是为了给你看 我让你们都盯着我的钻石看
